channel.title: attack.t1087 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.t1087 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Enumeration via the Global Catalog
item.description: Detects enumeration of the global catalog (that can be performed using BloodHound or others AD reconnaissance tools). Adjust Treshhold according to domain width.

item.title: Bloodhound and Sharphound Hack Tool
item.description: Detects command line parameters used by Bloodhound and Sharphound hack tools

item.title: Cisco Collect Data
item.description: Collect pertinent data from the configuration files

item.title: Hacktool Ruler
item.description: This events that are generated when using the hacktool Ruler by Sensepost

item.title: Reconnaissance Activity with Net Command
item.description: Detects a set of commands often used in recon stages by different attack groups

item.title: Suspicious Reconnaissance Activity
item.description: Detects suspicious command line activity on Windows systems

item.title: AD Privileged Users or Groups Reconnaissance
item.description: Detect priv users or groups recon based on 4661 eventid and known privileged users or groups SIDs

item.title: Domain User Enumeration Network Recon 01
item.description: Domain user and group enumeration via network reconnaissance. Seen in APT 29 and other common tactics and actors. Detects a set of RPC (remote procedure calls) used to enumerate a domain controller. The rule was created based off the datasets and hackathon from https://github.com/OTRF/detection-hackathon-apt29
